verses.verse: Maschil of Asaph. Give ear <S%H238><s%>, O my people <S%H5971><s%>, to my law <S%H8451><s%>: Incline <S%H5186><s%> your ears <S%H241><s%> to the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
I will open <S%H6605><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%> in a parable <S%H4912><s%>; I will utter <S%H5042><s%> dark sayings <S%H2420><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%>,
Which we have heard <S%H8085><s%> and known <S%H3045><s%>, And our fathers <S%H1><s%> have told us <S%H5608><s%>.

We will not hide <S%H3582><s%> them from their children <S%H1121><s%>, Telling <S%H5608><s%> to the generation <S%H1755><s%> to come <S%H314><s%> the praises <S%H8416><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And his strength <S%H5807><s%>, and his wondrous works <S%H6381><s%> that he hath done <S%H6213><s%>.

For he established <S%H6965><s%> a testimony <S%H5715><s%> in Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, And appointed <S%H7760><s%> a law <S%H8451><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> our fathers <S%H1><s%>, That they should make them known <S%H3045><s%> to their children <S%H1121><s%>;

That the generation <S%H1755><s%> to come <S%H314><s%> might know <S%H3045><s%> them <S%H1121><s%>, even the children that should be born <S%H3205><s%>; Who should arise <S%H6965><s%> and tell <S%H5608><s%> them to their children <S%H1121><s%>,

That they might set <S%H7760><s%> their hope <S%H3689><s%> in God <S%H430><s%>, And not forget <S%H7911><s%> the works <S%H4611><s%> of God <S%H410><s%>, But keep <S%H5341><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%>,

And might not be as their fathers <S%H1><s%>, A stubborn <S%H5637><s%> and rebellious <S%H4784><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%>, A generation <S%H1755><s%> that set <S%H3559><s%> not their heart <S%H3820><s%> aright <S%H3559><s%>, And whose spirit <S%H7307><s%> was not stedfast <S%H539><s%> with God <S%H410><s%>.

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, being armed <S%H5401><s%> and carrying <S%H7411><s%> bows <S%H7198><s%>, Turned back <S%H2015><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle <S%H7128><s%>.
They kept <S%H8104><s%> not the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, And refused <S%H3985><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his law <S%H8451><s%>;
And they forgat <S%H7911><s%> his doings <S%H5949><s%>, And his wondrous works <S%H5949><s%> that he had showed them <S%H7200><s%>.

Marvellous things <S%H6382><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> he in the sight <S%H5048><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, In the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%>.
He clave <S%H1234><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and caused them to pass through <S%H5674><s%>; And he made the waters <S%H4325><s%> to stand <S%H5324><s%> as a heap <S%H5067><s%>.
In the day-time <S%H3119><s%> also he led <S%H5148><s%> them with a cloud <S%H6051><s%>, And all the night <S%H3915><s%> with a light <S%H216><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>.
He clave <S%H1234><s%> rocks <S%H6697><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, And gave them drink <S%H8248><s%> abundantly as out of the <S%H7227><s%> depths <S%H8415><s%>.
He brought <S%H3318><s%> streams <S%H5140><s%> also out of the rock <S%H5553><s%>, And caused waters <S%H4325><s%> to run down <S%H3381><s%> like rivers <S%H5104><s%>.
Yet went they on still <S%H3254><s%> to sin <S%H2398><s%> against him <S%H4784><s%>, To rebel against the Most High <S%H5945><s%> in the desert <S%H6723><s%>.
And they tempted <S%H5254><s%> God <S%H410><s%> in their heart <S%H3824><s%> By asking <S%H7592><s%> food <S%H400><s%> according to their desire <S%H5315><s%>.
Yea <S%H1696><s%>, they spake against God <S%H430><s%>; They said <S%H559><s%>, Can <S%H3201><s%> God <S%H410><s%> prepare <S%H6186><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>?

Behold <S%H5221><s%>, he smote the rock <S%H6697><s%>, so that waters <S%H4325><s%> gushed out <S%H2100><s%>, And streams <S%H5158><s%> overflowed <S%H7857><s%>; Can <S%H3201><s%> he give <S%H5414><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> also <S%H3201><s%>? Will he provide <S%H3559><s%> flesh <S%H7607><s%> for his people <S%H5971><s%>?

Therefore Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%>, and was wroth <S%H5674><s%>; And a fire <S%H784><s%> was kindled <S%H5400><s%> against Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, And anger <S%H639><s%> also went up <S%H5927><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>;
Because they believed <S%H539><s%> not in God <S%H430><s%>, And trusted <S%H982><s%> not in his salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
Yet he commanded <S%H6680><s%> the skies <S%H7834><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>, And opened <S%H6605><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>;
And he rained down <S%H4305><s%> manna <S%H4478><s%> upon them to eat <S%H398><s%>, And gave <S%H5414><s%> them food <S%H1715><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
Man <S%H376><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of the mighty <S%H47><s%>: He sent <S%H7971><s%> them food <S%H6720><s%> to the full <S%H7648><s%>.
He caused the east wind <S%H6921><s%> to blow <S%H5265><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; And by his power <S%H5797><s%> he guided <S%H5090><s%> the south wind <S%H8486><s%>.
He rained <S%H4305><s%> flesh <S%H7607><s%> also upon them as the dust <S%H6083><s%>, And winged <S%H3671><s%> birds <S%H5775><s%> as the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%>:
And he let it fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of their camp <S%H4264><s%>, Round about <S%H5439><s%> their habitations <S%H4908><s%>.
So they did eat <S%H398><s%>, and were well <S%H3966><s%> filled <S%H7646><s%>; And he gave <S%H935><s%> them their own desire <S%H8378><s%>.
They were not estranged <S%H2114><s%> from that which they desired <S%H8378><s%>, Their food <S%H400><s%> was yet in their mouths <S%H6310><s%>,

When the anger <S%H639><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up against them <S%H2026><s%>, And slew of the fattest <S%H4924><s%> of them <S%H3766><s%>, And smote down the young <S%H970><s%> men of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
For all this they sinned <S%H2398><s%> still <S%H539><s%>, And believed not in his wondrous works <S%H6381><s%>.
Therefore their days <S%H3117><s%> did he consume <S%H3615><s%> in vanity <S%H1892><s%>, And their years <S%H8141><s%> in terror <S%H928><s%>.
When he slew <S%H2026><s%> them <S%H1875><s%>, then they inquired after him <S%H7725><s%>; And they returned and sought God <S%H410><s%> earnestly <S%H7836><s%>.
And they remembered <S%H2142><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> was their rock <S%H6697><s%>, And the Most High <S%H5945><s%> God <S%H410><s%> their redeemer <S%H1350><s%>.
But they flattered <S%H6601><s%> him with their mouth <S%H6310><s%>, And lied <S%H3576><s%> unto him with their tongue <S%H3956><s%>.
For their heart <S%H3820><s%> was not right <S%H3559><s%> with him <S%H539><s%>, Neither were they faithful in his covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

But he <S%H7349><s%>, being merciful, forgave <S%H3722><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and destroyed <S%H7843><s%> them not <S%H7235><s%>: Yea, many a time turned <S%H7725><s%> he his anger <S%H639><s%> away <S%H7725><s%>, And did not stir up <S%H5782><s%> all his wrath <S%H2534><s%>.
And he remembered <S%H2142><s%> that they were but flesh <S%H1320><s%>, A wind <S%H7307><s%> that passeth away <S%H1980><s%>, and cometh not again <S%H7725><s%>.
How <S%H4100><s%> oft did they rebel <S%H4784><s%> against him in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, And grieve <S%H6087><s%> him in the desert <S%H3452><s%>!
And they turned <S%H7725><s%> again and tempted <S%H5254><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, And provoked <S%H8428><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
They remember <S%H2142><s%> not his hand <S%H3027><s%>, Nor the day <S%H3117><s%> when he redeemed <S%H6299><s%> them from the adversary <S%H6862><s%>;
How he set <S%H7760><s%> his signs <S%H226><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, And his wonders <S%H226><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%>,
And turned <S%H2015><s%> their rivers <S%H2975><s%> into blood <S%H1818><s%>, And their streams <S%H2975><s%>, so that they could not drink <S%H8354><s%>.
He sent <S%H7971><s%> among them swarms of flies <S%H6157><s%>, which devoured <S%H398><s%> them <S%H6854><s%>; And frogs, which destroyed them <S%H7843><s%>.
He gave <S%H5414><s%> also their increase <S%H2981><s%> unto the caterpillar <S%H2625><s%>, And their labor <S%H3018><s%> unto the locust <S%H697><s%>.
He destroyed <S%H2026><s%> their vines <S%H1612><s%> with hail <S%H1259><s%>, And their sycomore-trees <S%H8256><s%> with frost <S%H2602><s%>.
He gave over <S%H5462><s%> their cattle <S%H1165><s%> also to the hail <S%H1259><s%>, And their flocks <S%H4735><s%> to hot thunderbolts <S%H7565><s%>.

He cast <S%H7971><s%> upon them the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of his anger <S%H639><s%>, Wrath <S%H5678><s%>, and indignation <S%H2195><s%>, and trouble <S%H6869><s%>, A band <S%H4917><s%> of angels <S%H4397><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%>.

He made <S%H6424><s%> a path <S%H5410><s%> for his anger <S%H639><s%>; He spared <S%H2820><s%> not their soul <S%H5315><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>, But gave <S%H5462><s%> their life <S%H2416><s%> over <S%H5462><s%> to the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>,
And smote <S%H5221><s%> all the first-born <S%H1060><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, The chief <S%H7225><s%> of their strength <S%H202><s%> in the tents <S%H168><s%> of Ham <S%H2526><s%>.
But he led forth <S%H5265><s%> his own people <S%H5971><s%> like sheep <S%H6629><s%>, And guided <S%H5090><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> like a flock <S%H5739><s%>.
And he led <S%H5148><s%> them safely <S%H983><s%>, so that they feared <S%H6342><s%> not <S%H3220><s%>; But the sea overwhelmed <S%H3680><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%>.
And he brought <S%H935><s%> them to the border <S%H1366><s%> of his sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, To this mountain <S%H2022><s%>, which his right hand <S%H3225><s%> had gotten <S%H7069><s%>.

He drove out <S%H1644><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> also before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H5307><s%>, And allotted them for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> by line <S%H2256><s%>, And made the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to dwell <S%H7931><s%> in their tents <S%H168><s%>.
Yet they tempted <S%H5254><s%> and rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against the Most High <S%H5945><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, And kept <S%H8104><s%> not his testimonies <S%H5713><s%>;
But turned back <S%H5472><s%>, and dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> like their fathers <S%H1><s%>: They were turned aside <S%H2015><s%> like a deceitful <S%H7423><s%> bow <S%H7198><s%>.
For they provoked him to anger <S%H3707><s%> with their high places <S%H1116><s%>, And moved him to jealousy <S%H7065><s%> with their graven images <S%H6456><s%>.
When God <S%H430><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> this <S%H5674><s%>, he was wroth, And greatly <S%H3966><s%> abhorred <S%H3988><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>;
So that he forsook <S%H5203><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>, The tent <S%H168><s%> which he placed <S%H7931><s%> among men <S%H120><s%>;
And delivered <S%H5414><s%> his strength <S%H5797><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%>, And his glory <S%H8597><s%> into the adversary <S%H6862><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%>.
He gave <S%H5462><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> over <S%H5462><s%> also unto the sword <S%H2719><s%>, And was wroth <S%H5674><s%> with his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
Fire <S%H784><s%> devoured <S%H398><s%> their young men <S%H970><s%>; And their virgins <S%H1330><s%> had no marriage-song <S%H1984><s%>.
Their priests <S%H3548><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>; And their widows <S%H490><s%> made no lamentation <S%H1058><s%>.
Then the Lord <S%H136><s%> awaked <S%H3364><s%> as one out of sleep <S%H3463><s%>, Like a mighty man <S%H1368><s%> that shouteth <S%H7442><s%> by reason of wine <S%H3196><s%>.
And he smote <S%H5221><s%> his adversaries <S%H6862><s%> backward <S%H268><s%>: He put <S%H5414><s%> them to a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> reproach <S%H2781><s%>.
Moreover he refused <S%H3988><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, And chose <S%H977><s%> not the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>,
But chose <S%H977><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, The mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> which he loved <S%H157><s%>.
And he built <S%H1129><s%> his sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> like the heights <S%H7311><s%>, Like the earth <S%H776><s%> which he hath established <S%H3245><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
He chose <S%H977><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> also his servant <S%H5650><s%>, And took <S%H3947><s%> him from the sheepfolds <S%H4356><s%>:

From following <S%H310><s%> the ewes that have their young <S%H5763><s%> he brought <S%H935><s%> him <S%H7462><s%>, To be the shepherd of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
So he was their shepherd <S%H7462><s%> according to the integrity <S%H8537><s%> of his heart <S%H3824><s%>, And guided <S%H5148><s%> them by the skilfulness <S%H8394><s%> of his hands <S%H3709><s%>.
